data.author: Khalil Gibran
data.quote: March on. Do not tarry. To go forward is to move toward perfection. March on, and fear not the thorns, or the sharp stones on life's path.

data.author: Benjamin Franklin
data.quote: A place for everything, everything in its place.

data.author: Ryan Howard
data.quote: I was perceived to be a first- to third-rounder. I kind of had a tough junior year and fell to the fifth round. At that time, it was motivational.

data.author: Jessica Raine
data.quote: I did an A Level in Theatre Studies and had a really inspirational teacher, and then I just went on to university.

data.author: Unknown
data.quote: Turn your face to the sun and the shadows fall behind you.

data.author: Saint Teresa of Avila
data.quote: Be gentle to all and stern with yourself.

data.author: George Lucas
data.quote: You simply have to put one foot in front of the other and keep going. Put blinders on and plow right ahead.

data.author: Sydney J. Harris
data.quote: Almost no one is foolish enough to imagine that he automatically deserves great success in any field of activity; yet almost everyone believes that he automatically deserves success in marriage.

data.author: Emily Dickinson
data.quote: I dwell in possibility.

data.author: Henri Nouwen
data.quote: The greatest trap in our life is not success, popularity or power, but self-rejection.

data.author: Dale Carnegie
data.quote: If you want to conquer fear, don't sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.

data.author: Walter Bagehot
data.quote: Dullness in matters of government is a good sign, and not a bad one - in particular, dullness in parliamentary government is a test of its excellence, an indication of its success.

data.author: John Muir
data.quote: How glorious a greeting the sun gives the mountains!

data.author: Darell Hammond
data.quote: Growing up in a group home, and with an undiagnosed learning disability to boot, the odds of success were not on my side. But when I joined the high school football team, I learned the value of discipline, focus, persistence, and teamwork - all skills that have proven vital to my career as a C.E.O. and social entrepreneur.

data.author: Alice Foote MacDougall
data.quote: Success is an absurd, erratic thing. She arrives when one least expects her and after she has come may depart again almost because of a whim.

data.author: Elbert Hubbard
data.quote: The line between failure and success is so fine that we scarcely know when we pass it: so fine that we are often on the line and do not know it.

data.author: Jon Bon Jovi
data.quote: Success is falling nine times and getting up ten.

data.author: Paul Bryant
data.quote: If you believe in yourself and have dedication and pride - and never quit, you'll be a winner. The price of victory is high but so are the rewards.

data.author: Rose Kennedy
data.quote: I know not age, nor weariness nor defeat.

data.author: Cyrus McCormick
data.quote: Indomitable perseverance in a business, properly understood, always ensures ultimate success.
